ItemHint.Label: Item Hints
ItemHint.AuraHint: If disabled, no aura info is displayed for identified magic items.
ItemHint.IconizeHint: Use icons instead of text for hints where possible.
ItemHint.IconizeSchoolHint: Keys uses 3 letter combo. Thassilonian runes miss Divination and Universal and thus use Truth and Diligence runes instead.

Combo.Label: Combo Hints
Combo.Hint: Display both icon and text if available.

Glow.Label: Magic Glow
Glow.Hint: If enabled, magical items have their name glow when identified according to the strength of their aura.

ItemHint.ValueHint: Show value for different selections of items.

Value.Expanded: Trade goods, containers, and container contents

ItemHint.SanityHint: Adds warnings about strange values among the hints.
ItemHint.ChangeHint: These are only guidelines and not entirely reliable or accurate.
ItemHint.LangHint: Includes shorter labels introduced by the module not present in base system. Has effect only if non-English language is used.
ItemHint.MaxLabelLengthHint: If change/note hint's label grows longer than this, it'll be replaced with simpler "Many" tag.
ItemHint.CompatHint: Enable compatibility mode, ignoring some errors known to cause issues with alternate character sheets.
ItemHint.HomebrewHint: Toggles some homebrew supporting functionality. For now this simply disables item caster level check.
ItemHint.CustomPlaceholder: No custom hints. Read above for instructions.
ItemHint.Instructions: Custom item hints can be used to show changing information about an item. Semicolon (;) can be used to separate multiple hints. Vertical bar (|) can be used to separate text from hover (tooltip) text and from additional instructions (format: label|hint|instructions). Roll data is available for inline rolls.

Sanity.FCBInequal: FCB not equal to level (difference of {diff}).

Change.TargetlessHint: Includes an incomplete Change or Context Note with no target.
Change.BadTargetHint: Includes Change or Context Note with malformed target: {target}
Change.FormulalessHint: Includes an incomplete Change with no formula.
Change.TextlessHint: Includes an incomplete Context Note with no text: {target}.
